install.packages("shiny")
library(shiny)

ui = fluidPage(
  textInput(inputId = "zscore", label = "Set the z score to see the one tailed p value left of the z score"), 
  verbatimTextOutput(outputId = "p value")
)
server = function(input, output) {
  input$text = renderText(textInput)
  output$text = renderText({ input$text })
}
shinyApp(ui=ui, server=server)
